sentences.sContent: What an inspiration she was to all around her!
sentences.sContent_eng: What an inspiration she was to all around her!
sentences.sCn: 她对于她周围所有的人是一种多么大的鼓舞!

sentences.sContent: All those around him looked at him with amazement.
sentences.sContent_eng: All those around him looked at him with amazement.
sentences.sCn: 周围的人都对他投射出惊异的眼光。

...The manager told me that Jack Green's been very active around the shop the last few days...
...It’s great because we play cards or just sit around and talk when there are no customers...
